COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Could you repeat the original request?

EXCELLENT_I_WILL_LET_THE_RECIPIENT_KNOW_.message: Excellent. I will let the recipient know you are on your way.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_0.message: GOING TO the {system} system? Money paid for delivery of a small package.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_1.message: WANTED. Delivery of a package to the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_2.message: URGENT. Fast ship needed to deliver a package to the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_3.message: DELIVERY. Documents to the {system} system. {cash} to an experienced pilot.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_4.message: POSTAL SERVICE. We require a ship for the delivery run to {system} system.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_5.message: MOVING HOME. Move of hardware to {starport} from storage.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_6.message: SHORT-RANGE COURIER. Delivery of a small package to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_7.message: INTER-PLANETARY CARGO. Freight of local cargo to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_8.message: NEARBY DELIVERY. Require quick delivery of an item to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_9.message: PACKAGE DROP. Urgent dispatch of perishables to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_0.message: Unacceptable! You took forever over that delivery. I'm not willing to pay you.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_1.message: I'm frustrated by the late delivery of my package, and I refuse to pay you.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_2.message: I was quite clear about the deadline and am very disappointed by the late delivery. You will not be paid.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_3.message: Useless! I will never depend on you again! Needless to say, you will not be paid for this.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_4.message: Your ship registration has been noted, we will reject all further applications for work from you.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_5.message: What are these? Oh, you took so long that I forgot I'd even sent this!

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_6.message: I could have delivered it faster myself. I'm not paying you.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_7.message: Our customers are not going to be happy with this. Do not expect to be paid.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_8.message: You were offered a premium for quick delivery! I refuse to pay for this.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_9.message: It's all spoilt, this is of no use to anyone! We cannot and will not pay you.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_0.message: Hi, I'm {name}. I'll pay you {cash} if you will deliver a small package to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_1.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry a package to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_2.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry a package to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_3.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry a package to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_4.message: Greetings. This is an automated message from Bedford and {name} Courier Services. We pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_5.message: Nice to meet you. I am {name} and I'm willing to pay {cash} for someone with a ship to help me move my belongings to {starport}. No rush, they are just some leftovers from moving house.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_6.message: Hi. I'm {name} and I will pay {cash} for a ship to deliver this package to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_7.message: Hello. We need these crates delivered to {starport} as soon as possible. Standard payment for this shipment is {cash}.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_8.message: My name is {name} and I need this item delivered to a friend at {starport} pronto, I'll pay you {cash} credits if you get it there in a reasonable time.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_9.message: Greetings, we're behind with our produce shipment and need it delivered to {starport} urgently. We'll pay you {cash} for your troubles.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_0.message: Thank you for the delivery. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_1.message: The package has been received and you have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_2.message: You have been paid in full for the delivery. Thank you.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_3.message: Your timely and discrete service is much appreciated. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_4.message: Your timely and discrete service is much appreciated. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_5.message: Oh wonderful. I'll start unloading immediately. Thanks again.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_6.message: Thank you for the package, you have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_7.message: Excellent, we've credited the funds into your account.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_8.message: Your prompt delivery is appreciated, I have credited your account accordingly.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_9.message: Grand! We'll start unpacking immediately. I'll have your account updated right away.

FLAVOUR_WHYSOMUCHTEXT_0.message: When a friend visited me she left behind some clothes and antique paper books. I'd like to have them returned to her.

FLAVOUR_WHYSOMUCHTEXT_2.message: It is a research proposal and must be delivered by the deadline or we may not get funding.

FLAVOUR_WHYSOMUCHTEXT_3.message: Some extremely sensitive documents have fallen into my hands, and I have reason to believe that the leak has been traced to me.

FLAVOUR_WHYSOMUCHTEXT_4.message: We would be happy to pay you less money.

FLAVOUR_WHYSOMUCHTEXT_5.message: Is it a lot? I should rethink my offer!

FLAVOUR_WHYSOMUCHTEXT_6.message: I don't think it's a lot.

FLAVOUR_WHYSOMUCHTEXT_7.message: Standard rates, we work with the market.

HOW_SOON_MUST_IT_BE_DELIVERED.message: How soon must it be delivered?

IT_COULD_BE_DANGEROUS_YOU_SHOULD_MAKE_SU.message: It could be dangerous, you should make sure you're adequately prepared.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_0.message: You're going to regret dealing with {client}

PIRATE_TAUNTS_1.message: Looks like my paycheck has arrived!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_2.message: You're working for {client}? That was a bad idea.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_3.message: Your cargo and your life, pilot!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_4.message: I'm sure this will bring a pretty penny on the market

PIRATE_TAUNTS_5.message: Today isn't your lucky day! Prepare to die.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_6.message: Tell my old friend {client} that I'll see them in hell!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_7.message: That package isn't going to reach it's destination today.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_9.message: You'll pay for that cargo, with your life.

THIS_IS_A_VALUABLE_PACKAGE_YOU_SHOULD_KE.message: This is a valuable package, you should keep your eyes open.

THIS_IS_VERY_RISKY_YOU_WILL_ALMOST_CERTA.message: This is very risky, you will almost certainly run into resistance.

WILL_I_BE_IN_ANY_DANGER.message: Will I be in any danger?
